nice_specialty_area_description: Executes collection using appropriate strategies and within the priorities established through the collection management process.
work_role: All Source-Collection Manager
work_role_description:
Identifies collection authorities and environment; incorporates priority information requirements into collection management; develops concepts to meet leadership's intent. Determines capabilities of available collection assets, identifies new collection capabilities; and constructs and disseminates collection plans.  Monitors execution of tasked collection to ensure effective execution of the collection plan. CO-CLO-001

work_role: Cyber Intel Planner
work_role_description:
Develops detailed intelligence plans to satisfy cyber operations requirements. Collaborates with cyber operations planners to identify, validate, and levy requirements for collection and analysis. Participates in targeting selection, validation, synchronization, and execution of cyber actions. Synchronizes intelligence activities to support organization objectives in cyberspace. CO-OPL-001
